mapper.select:
WITH latest_messages AS ( SELECT m1.chatroom_id, m1.type, m1.data, m1.create_date, m1.id FROM message m1 JOIN ( SELECT chatroom_id, MAX(id) AS max_message_id FROM message GROUP BY chatroom_id ) m2 ON m1.chatroom_id = m2.chatroom_id AND m1.id = m2.max_message_id )
SELECT chatroom.id AS chatroomId, member.nick AS nick, chatroom.state AS state, COALESCE(message.type, '') AS type, COALESCE(message.data, '') AS data, COALESCE(message.create_date, chatroom.create_date) AS create_date FROM chatroom JOIN chat_relation ON chatroom.id = chat_relation.chatroom_id JOIN member ON member.id = chat_relation.member_id LEFT JOIN latest_messages message ON chatroom.id = message.chatroom_id WHERE chatroom.id IN ( SELECT chatroom_id FROM chat_relation WHERE member_id = #{loginMemberId} ) AND member_id != #{loginMemberId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message(chatroom_id, member_id, data) VALUES (#{chatroomId}, #{memberId}, #{data});
